name: The Bitles
description:
!::=------>) ThE -- BitLeS (<------=::!

The Bitles are little creatures who look like beetles and are greedy for Bitcoins. Help them solve complex puzzles around the world and collect Bitcoins for a living.
This game is a free puzzler inspired by a classic hit from the past, Chu-Chu Rocket by Sega, but with our own new gameplay elements added to it.

You can play the game in Puzzle or Challenge mode, and you will get a Bitcoin reward everyday if you have played the game the day before, no matter if you won or lost, you will get the reward anyways, which is a part of our advertising earnings.
When you reach the minimum Bitcoin balance, you can withdraw your earnings to your BTC wallet.
Getting paid to have fun... one stone two birds!

The game is already finished and available through the official site http://TheBitles.com and the mobile app stores.
